mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD ( NO, CATEGORY_NO, WRITER_NO, TITLE, CONTENT ) VALUES ( #{no}, #{categoryNo}, #{writerNo}, #{title}, #{content} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM BOARD WHERE DEL_DATE IS NULL ORDER BY ENROLL_DATE DESC;

SELECT B.NO, B.CATEGORY_NO, B.WRITER_NO, B.TITLE, B.CONTENT, B.ENROLL_DATE, B.SECRET_YN, B.MODIFY_DATE, B.DEL_DATE, COUNT(V.VISITOR_NUM) AS VISIT_COUNT FROM BOARD B LEFT JOIN VISITOR V ON B.NO = V.BOARD_NO GROUP BY B.NO, B.CATEGORY_NO, B.WRITER_NO, B.TITLE, B.CONTENT, B.ENROLL_DATE, B.SECRET_YN, B.MODIFY_DATE, B.DEL_DATE ORDER BY VISIT_COUNT DESC;
